bit 8: 0 = no help information available | 1 = help information available

BOOLEAN SimSelectItemOptions::PresentationAsNavigationOptions (   )  const [inline]
 

bit 2: 0 = presentation as a choice of data values if bit 1 = '1' | 1 = presentation as a choice of navigation options if bit 1 is '1'

BOOLEAN SimSelectItemOptions::PresentationTypeAvailable (   )  const [inline]
 

bit 1: 0 = presentation type is not specified | 1 = presentation type is specified in bit 2

bit 3: 0 = no selection preference | 1 = selection using soft key preferred
